text: Saudhamini is a 2003 Indian Malayalam film, directed by P. Gopikumar, starring Krishna and Sruthi in the lead role. http://www.malayalamcinema.com/rating_soudamini.htm ==Cast== * JayaKrishnan * Krishna * Captain Raju * Ambika Mohan * Bindu Krishna * Chithra * Jagadish * Jagannadha Varma * Kalamandalam Kesavan * Kulappulli Leela * Mamukkoya * Sruthi * Sumitha * Vallathol Unnikrishnan ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam-language films
title: Saudhamini
